basics.name: Kusno Mudiarto
basics.label: Coder, Doer, Problem Solver
basics.summary: Kusno Mudiarto is an accomplished software developer with expertise in web technologies, and experiences with mobile and embedded software. His passion is to make excellent software to increase productivity and will help simplify user's life.

work.summary: Coupa makes companies more profitable by reducing their costs; all with one simple platform that employees actually enjoy using.
highlights: Lead Engineer for Coupa Expenses
Designed and developed multiple key features, like: Corporate Card Integration, Travel Integration, and Overall System Improvements
Technology Used: Ruby on Rails

work.summary: 5000hands empower people and organizations to create social projects, provide tools to promote, engage and manage volunteers efficiently.
highlights: Has been used to manage 300+ projects and 5000+ volunteers around San Diego
Designed and implemented 5000hands concepts and website
Technology Used: Python, AppEngine, Backbone, Bootstrap
Designed and implemented Esthersnc.com, leading eCommerce website for DIY nail polish and nail treatments
Designed and implemented 5000Commerce.com, a web application to synchronize data between BigCommerce and Quickbooks
Technology Used: Python, AppEngine, Drupal, Ubercart, Wordpress, Ubuntu
Released several apps to Apple AppStore
Designed and implemented zoomIt reader and zoomIt music apps for zoomIt hardware
Designed and implemented comic reader app for iPhone
Designed and implemented prototype iPhone TV app for MediaFLO
Implemented ATE - Automated Test Engine for Qualcomm's MediaFLO
Technology Used: iOS, Objective-C, Rails, Perl
Managed a team of 6 to develop and maintain SKY Web Browser
Designed and developed SKY Instant Messaging, an IM client that supports Wireless Village protocols
Released and managed software build and deliveries to internal and multiple clients
Technology Used: C++, ARM Assembly Language, Nucleus, Symbian, QT, JTAG, ClearCase, ClearQuest, Ruby

work.summary: Telephony box to replace telecom company
highlights: Designed and developed Log Manager System, a distributed, fault tolerant and redundant logging system
Developed and maintained CLX OS C++ framework with a team of 3
Helped perform daily load sanity tests for multiple builds and releases
Technology Used: C, C++, Intel Assembly Language, pSOS, Windows, Continuus

volunteer.summary: Annual day of service event that benefits causes around San Diego
highlights: Designed and implemented website registration & coordination system that enables the event to support 1000+ volunteers and 100+ projects around San Diego annually
